pages.text: $(item)Monster Tartare$() is a Food item cooked in the $(pot)Advanced Crock Pot$() by adding 2 $(thing)Monster$() Foods, 1 $(thing)Eggs$() and 0.5 $(thing)Vegetable$(). It takes 30 seconds to cook.
Unlike $(item)Monster Lasagna$(), consumed $(item)Monster Tartare$() will not damage the player and will remove the $(thing)wither effect$().
